0.0.1.en: First working version with power limiting features only.

0.0.2.en: Fixed readout of max power in app

0.1.0.en: First working version with temperature set points

0.1.2.en: Added support for frost guard and cleaned up the on/off control

0.1.3.en: Fixed a bug in the on/off function

0.1.4.en: Fixed broken promise + added debug code

0.2.0.en: Added readouts of state to the piggybank insights device.

0.2.1.en: Added user warning to the device settings

0.3.1.en: Fixed a crash when zones was involved

0.4.0.en: Added two capabilities to the insights device: Show available power and House efficiency

0.4.2.en: Various cleanups in the control panel

0.5.0.en: Added capability to read reserved power from the device

0.5.1.en: Removed inactive action card and code

0.5.3.en: Fixed the zone capability as zones was not properly turned off + fixed the efficiency capability as the off count was incorrect in some cases

0.5.4.en: Added Configurable Main Fuse in App Settings to limit maximum power drawn

0.5.5.en: Minor fix if the main fuse is not set correctly + renamed some modes to be more generic

0.5.7.en: Fixed a bug when setting a new poll interval

0.5.8.en: Fixed a crash in case of restart

0.5.9.en: Added debug capability and improved error handling for failed signals

0.5.13.en: Fixed a bug that prevented new debug capabilities to show up if debug was already enabled in previous app version.

0.5.16.en: Fixed bug where temperature was not set correctly on mode updates

0.5.17.en: Fixed a bug that prevented statistics from being reported

0.5.18.en: Minor translation issues + help text and fixed a bug where statistics was not calculated.

0.5.19.en: Fixed minor typo in the stats calculation that reset some stats every hour

0.5.20.en: The devices will now be refreshed with new temperatures when the settings are being changed

0.5.22.en: Fixed an error displaying the mode capability

0.5.23.en: Capability value fix when setting mode

0.5.24.en: Removed crash when user has not completed setup process. + added notice when settings are being saved.

0.6.0.en: Added support to fetch energy prices from the app no.almli.utilitycost and use it to control price points internally + new statistics for savings + improved translations

0.6.1.en: Fixed a bug displaying price point in the device + fixed an invalid reference in app settings

0.6.2.en: Changed some units so iẗ́'s possible to compare with insights

0.6.3.en: Moved the savings capabilities into experimental info so it is clear that they are not expected to work properly yet

0.6.4.en: Added 'Remember to save' hint in settings page

0.6.5.en: Cosmetic changes only (position and visibility of Remember to save hint)

0.6.6.en: The device now show as disabled when the app operating mode is deactivated. + Added ability to show current state in the log window in the app setitngs. + fixed saving hint that did not go away when settings was saved

0.6.9.en: Fixed the experimental feature money saved as it was 1000 times higher than expected

0.6.10.en: More logging when requesting current state in the log panel

0.6.11.en: Now the max power limit can both be selected from the default limits and input manually

0.6.13.en: Average price is now stored between reboots

0.6.14.en: Increased width of some input boxes in the setup screen so they are easier to edit

0.6.15.en: Changed the power cycle to decrease as the hour end is approaching as the available power increases faster at this point and the time to take advantage of it decreases.

0.6.16.en: Fixed a bug when restarting the app in the middle of an hour. The bug might turn all devices off for the rest of the hour

0.6.17.en: Added limit on maximum overuse of power to avoid clutter in the history graphs

0.7.0.en: Added improved car charging support by enabling a threshold option for when to report free power

0.7.1.en: The free power threshold was not saved in previous version

0.8.0.en: Added flow for current available power + fixed bug that prevented the trigger unable-to-limit-power from triggering

0.8.1.en: Made sure the avaiable power trigger does not trigger more often than once every minute

0.8.2.en: Fixed bug where turning on/off devices could be based on state from another device. + Fixed when overshooting the power roof is reported, it did not account for reserved power. + Improvements in stability if some devices does not respond properly.

0.8.3.en: Changed the internal price evaluation scheme to be easier to understand and use

0.8.4.en: Fixed a bug in previous version that prevented you from saving settings.

0.8.5.en: Fixed a bug where the low price limit was not set correctly

0.8.6.en: Fixed a bug in the internal calculation of price points + improved text in the price tab setup page

0.8.7.en: Fixed a bug when selecting the minimum number of cheap/expensive hours. Instead it was treated as not more than.

0.8.8.en: Fixed a bug that prevented calculation of price points

0.8.9.en: Fixed 2 crashes that could occur when the app has not been configured yet and one crash that occur when the utility price API has not been installed

0.8.10.en: Added 2 minute waiting time at midnight before new prices are fetched as the price api need time to update its prices

0.8.11.en: Some translation fixes + Increased minimum device poll time to avoid bad performance. + Added info about funding and sponsoring

0.8.12.en: Moved the app tagline from the readme to the description and cleaned up the readme-files a little

0.8.13.en: Updated the tagline to be more catchy

0.8.14.en: Security fix: Moved devicelist refresh from web api into settings to avoid other apps from calling it. + Added public api for other apps to check for the presence of this app.

0.8.15.en: Added price point extreme for extremely high prices

0.8.16.en: Made sure that the new extreme price point cannot be entered unless it has been configured

0.8.17.en: Updated the action change-piggy-bank-price-point to support the new extremely high price point

0.8.18.en: Fixed a bug where the configuration validation failed to validate due to the new price point for extremely high prices

0.8.19.en: Added capability to show the limit for extremely high prices in the insights device

0.9.0.en: Added Emergency off option that will only turn off devices if needed and ignore state otherwise.

0.10.0.en: Added posibility to Completely ignore devices for some price points

0.10.1.en: When adding devices with thermostats the default setpoint temperatures in the app will now be based on the current setting instead of a static variable.

0.10.2.en: Fixed crash as reported by Krisch2 in the forum

0.10.3.en: Added additional protection against crash bug as reported by Krisch2 in the forum

0.10.4.en: Fixed crash bug when Homey was overloaded. + Fixed the device state monitor that would fail to correct invalid device states caused by bad signalling for some hours after entering the app setup page.

0.10.5.en: Improved reliability -> Added more handling of homeyAPI timeouts

0.10.6.en: Fixed bug in the monitor that prevented correction of incorrect temperatures within short timespan after the app was restarted.

0.10.7.en: Fixed bug in the monitor that could make the monitor turn off devices instead of on in case emergency off was chosen.

0.11.0.en: Now require Strømregning api 1.5 + Added fetching grid costs from Strømregning + Added search tags and images + Minor fix: Made sure the low price limit is never above the High price limit and vice versa. + Changes to the user interface + Breaking change: Moved the max hourly usage setting from the operating mode into a global setting + Changed step for setting temperatures to 0.5 instead of 1

0.11.1.en: Fixed a bug with maxPower that was set incorrectly when saving settings (introduced in version 0.11.0)

0.11.2.en: Temperature control can now be disabled + Price points can now be disabled + Added app configuration warnings

0.11.3.en: Fixed one of the new warnings that was displayed incorrectly

0.11.4.en: Added additional warning messages in the device state checking window

0.11.5.en: Fixed some minor issues when to display warnings

0.11.6.en: Added new debug option to list troublesom devices. This was needed to see the capabilities of the Easee charger (thanks @dooniem)

0.11.7.en: Fixed some warnings that was shown incorrectly + Added more help sections

0.11.8.en: Fixed a bug where the app state was incorrectly transferred to the insights device + Fixed a bug where the app reported free power when it was not supposed to + Now the insights device will show as unavailable if the app is incorrectly configured

0.11.9.en: Added function in the log page to report what is returned from the price api.

0.11.10.en: Added information about the Easee car charger

0.11.11.en: New warning when the Utilitycost app use price from flows

0.12.0.en: Added capability "enabled" to the onoff-detection. This should add the Easee car charger

0.12.1.en: After optional temperature setting was added no temperature was set on any device regardless of setting

0.12.2.en: Fixed a bug as reported by @Krisch2 in the forum (Incorrectly reported error messages

0.12.3.en: Fixed crash bug when price point was set to disabled.

0.12.4.en: Made sure the energy state is kept across app restarts / every new version.

0.12.5.en: Fixed bug as reported by Torbjorn_Melbye in the forum. (incorrect display of price point)

0.12.6.en: Fixed spelling mistake in alarm capability
